[[Emma Geller-Greene]] (great-granddaughter) }} '''Ida Greene''' is the mother of [[Leonard Greene|Dr. Leonard Greene]] and the paternal grandmother of [[Amy Greene|Amy]], [[Rachel Greene|Rachel]] and [[Jill Greene]]. This relationship makes her the great-grandmother of Rachel's daughter, [[Emma Geller-Greene|Emma]]. She is an unseen character on the show; she is mentioned in "[[The One With Rachel's Phone Number]]" when [[Phoebe Buffay|Phoebe]] and Rachel go out to a bar and meet two guys who live in her building. Apparently, she smells like potatoes so the people who lived in her building nicknamed her "Spuds."
